short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app verifies certificate issued by ScriptGurus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScriptGurus is a group of IT enthusiasts whose primary objective is to improve awareness among people (IT enthusiasts, students, developers, professionals, etc.) on ICT and how they can improve their skills in consonance with the updates regarding the use of technology. It aims to provide an avenue for people in a certain community to collaborate and learn more things about new technologies and how these technologies would be keys to innovation.
ScriptGurus' Certificate Verification App
